message:
Dear Geeks,
I need a script to let me Add and Remove Textbox Dynamically (+ & - ) With jQuery..

anyone help ?

data.message:
If you want to learn the correct way I advise you use event delegation which has better benefits: 

http://davidwalsh.name/event-delegate

and

http://net.tutsplus.com/tutorials/javascript-ajax/quick-tip-javascript-event-delegation-in-4-minutes/

and if you seek doing with with jQuery here you go: http://davidwalsh.name/delegate-event
